alert.note: Alert for Paulding; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Putnam, southeastern Paulding, eastern Van Wert and northwestern Allen Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 420 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Delphos, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Delphos, Columbus Grove, Kalida, Ottoville, Middle Point, Fort Jennings, Dupont, Cloverdale, Venedocia, Wetzel, Vaughnsville, Rushmore, Mandale and Rimer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
